name: cache-sh
description: CLI tool to use cache for cli-commands to prevent long running commands from executing unnecessarily
author: Albert Groothedde <alber70g@gmail.com>

scripts.changelog: auto-changelog -p -u -l 999 -b 999 && git add changelog.md && git commit -m "chore: update changelog"
scripts.publish:major: pnpm run build && pnpm run changelog && npm version major && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish:minor: pnpm run build && pnpm run changelog && npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish:patch: pnpm run build && pnpm run changelog && npm version patch && npm publish && git push
